metadata.title: Mohammed Aydan | Full Stack Developer | Web & Mobile Development
metadata.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in React, Next.js, Flutter, and .NET Core. Creating high-performance web and mobile applications with modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.description: I'm Mohammed Aydan, a Computer Science student at Mansoura University, Egypt (Expected graduation: 2027). I specialize in full-stack development with a strong focus on performance, scalability, and user experience. My passion for software development drives me to continuously learn and improve my skills, creating applications that are not only functional but also provide exceptional user experiences.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Academic Background
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer and Information Science
education.university: Faculty of Computer & Information Sciences – Mansoura University, Egypt

projects.description: Completed projects across web and mobile platforms

ecommerceApi.title: Ecommerce API
ecommerceApi.description: Developed an e-commerce API using .NET Core to manage categories, products, users.

chatApp.title: Chat App
chatApp.description: Added chat features to the social media app using Firebase for real-time messaging.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Created a personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills using modern web technologies.

storeApp.description: Built an e-commerce mobile app with Flutter.
